name: A Cat In Crime
description:
Team 928's submission to KSU Game Jam Fall 2018. A Cat in Crime, a stealth game where you play as a blackmailed detective, forced to turn a blind eye to evidence at a crime scene.

Members: Garrett Eddy, Luke Crowley, Austin Huffman, and Jaylin Gillam

Controls

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Mouse - Look

Left Click - Interact

Left Click (Hold) - Pick up items

F2 - Reset all objects

F3 - Reset current scene

F4 - Reset game

Escape - Pause

Bug Fixes: (changes made between jam build and final edition)

- Fixed collision bugs

- Fixed audio bugs

- Added debug tools

- Minimized pause menu UI
